text: Ida von Kortzfleisch (1850-1915), was a German educator. She is known as the founder of the Reifensteiner Schulen, a chain of household schools for women which became very popular and influential from 1896 onward. == References == * Johannes Kramer: Das ländlich-hauswirtschaftliche Bildungswesen in Deutschland, Dissertation an der Universität Erlangen, Fulda 1913 Category:19th-century German people Category:19th-century German educators Category:1850 births Category:1915 deaths
title: Ida von Kortzfleisch
